title: Social Media-Based Online Self-Regulated Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and online learning experience
context.additional_context: A course for managerial roles to enhance social domain job competencies. Implements learning environments applicable to real-life scenarios through VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can develop study plans using self-regulated learning strategies on social media platforms.
Learners can develop the ability to evaluate the credibility of online content through YouTube comment analysis techniques.
In VR simulation environments, learners can strengthen self-regulated learning competencies through interactions with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
